definition: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora/CITES
pinyin: Bin1 wei1 Ye3 sheng1 Dong4 Zhi2 wu4 zhong3 Guo2 ji4 Mao4 yi4 Gong1 yue1
containing_words.word: 瀕危野生動植物種國際貿易公約

sentences.english: The Naoli River Watershed is an important breeding area for rare and endangered Oriental White Stork.
sentences.chinese: 撓力河流域是瀕危水禽東方白鸛主要繁殖區域。

sentences.english: Zhalong is the ideal home for cranes and many other endangered birds.
sentences.chinese: 扎龍是鶴和其它瀕危鳥類的理想棲息地。

sentences.english: How to protect endangered species is a multi-faceted issue.
sentences.chinese: 如何保護瀕危物種是一個涉及到多方面因素的問題。

sentences.english: Endangered. Bwindi Impenetrable Forest, Uganda. [High resolution]
sentences.chinese: 瀕危。烏干達，布溫迪森林公園

sentences.english: What does it take to encourage endangered species to breed?
sentences.chinese: 用什麼措施來鼓勵瀕危物種的繁殖呢？

sentences.english: They include the endangered Mexican Wolf and giant Saguaro cactus.
sentences.chinese: 包括了瀕危的墨西哥狼和巨大的薩掛諾仙人掌。

sentences.english: The dam further imperils delicate fish populations in the Yangtze.
sentences.chinese: 三峽大壩也進一步威脅着長江瀕危魚類的種羣繁殖。
利用色盲這一點拯救瀕危鯊種？

sentences.english: We’ve pulled a number of endangered species out of their stomachs.
sentences.chinese: 我們曾從他們的胃中發現過一批瀕危物種。

sentences.english: UNESCO's meeting also updates its list of endangered beauty spots.
sentences.chinese: UNESCO的會議也更新了瀕危的風景區名單。

sentences.english: And new laws to protect threatened animals are not always enforced.
sentences.chinese: 新制定的有關保護瀕危動物的法律並不總是得到實行。

sentences.english: All of the big apes are now considered endangered.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些大猿目前都被認爲是瀕危物種。

sentences.english: The Chinese alligator is extremely threatened with only a few dozen inhibiting the Yangtze River valley.
sentences.chinese: 中國的短吻鱷已經瀕危，只在長江谷內存活着幾十條。

sentences.english: This paper mainly discusses the geographical distribution and protection of the rare and threatened plants.
sentences.chinese: 主要討論了三清山珍稀瀕危植物地理分佈及保護。

sentences.english: And a lot of them are at risk.
sentences.chinese: 但現在很多種米諾魚都面臨瀕危。

sentences.english: Unquestioningly, this rare species have been on the brink of being something of the past.
sentences.chinese: 毋庸置疑的是這些稀有物種正處於瀕危滅絕的邊緣。

definition: to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)
reptiles/also written 爬行類|爬行类
(bird species of China) black-faced spoonbill (Platalea minor)
